title: 【1.9CB】为什么刷出来的是小猪刷怪笼？
author: 杨了个景
txt_content: /setblock ~ ~+2 ~ mob_spawner 0 replace {EntityId:"FallingSand",MaxSpawnDelay:10,MaxSpawnDelay:10,SpawnCount:1,Delay:10,RequiredPlayerRange:200,SpawnRange:10,MaxNearbyEntities:1,SpawnPotentials:[{Type:"FallingSand",Weight:1,Properties:{Tile:152,Pos:[-644,4,-1868]}},{Type:"FallingSand",Weight:1,Properties:{Tile:152,Pos:[-642,4,-1868]}},{Type:"FallingSand",Weight:1,Properties:{Tile:152,Pos:[-640,4,-1868]}},{Type:"FallingSand",Weight:1,Properties:{Tile:152,Pos:[-638,4,-1868]}},{Type:"FallingSand",Weight:1,Properties:{Tile:152,Pos:[-636,4,-1868]}}]}复制代码我要的红石块刷怪笼呢？怎么激活后变小猪了？

replies.author: 林扬骐
replies.txt_content:
目前我暂时整不出来{:10_493:}如果lz是做随机器的话大可不必如此，用@r更加简单稳定，可以试试下面的方法：

1.先在你需要的地方fill出名为“suijiqi”的药水云（fill实体教程）
fill x y z x2 y2 z2 command_block 0 replace {auto:1,Command:summon AreaEffectCloud ~ ~ ~ {Duration:2100000000,CustomName:"suijiqi"}}复制代码

2.清除fill出的命令方块：
execute @e[name=suijiqi] ~ ~ ~ setblock ~ ~ ~ air复制代码

3.之后每次随机放红石块就用下面的命令：
execute @r[name=suijiqi] ~ ~ ~ setblock ~ ~ ~ redstone_block复制代码
当然，之后还可以把红石块清除来重置：
execute @e[name=suijiqi] ~ ~ ~ detect ~ ~ ~ redstone_block -1 setblock ~ ~ ~ air复制代码

所以说，条条大路通罗马，方法总比困难多，还要学会随机应变然而如果lz一定要刷怪笼我就真的不行了

replies.author: Deing
replies.txt_content:
1.9刷怪笼里边没有entityid这个nbt了，你要这样写
/setblock ~ ~+2 ~ mob_spawner 0 replace {MinSpawnDelay:1,MaxSpawnDelay:10,SpawnCount:1,Delay:2,RequiredPlayerRange:200,SpawnRange:10,MaxNearbyEntities:10,SpawnData:{id:FallingSand,Block:redstone_block,Time:1}}
你没有写block和time，写block：redstone才能使掉落沙成为红石形态，写time：1才能让掉落沙稳定存在而不是一下子消失
其他的自己补吧，有问题请再问

还有你写了两个maxspawndelay，有一个应该是minspawndelay。

replies.author: Deing
replies.txt_content:
Deing 发表于 2016-3-11 09:14
1.9刷怪笼里边没有entityid这个nbt了，你要这样写
/setblock ~ ~+2 ~ mob_spawner 0 replace {MinSpawnDela ...
啊不我想错了，你加了spawnpotentials所以不需要写block和time，只要在spawndata里写上id：fallingsand就好了（我这里都没大写）

replies.author: 杨了个景
replies.txt_content:
Deing 发表于 2016-3-11 09:22
啊不我想错了，你加了spawnpotentials所以不需要写block和time，只要在spawndata里写上id：fallingsand就 .../setblock ~ ~+2 ~ mob_spawner 0 replace {SpawnData:{id:FallingSand},MaxSpawnDelay:10,MinS
pawnDelay:10,SpawnCount:1,Delay:10,RequiredPlayerRange:200,SpawnRange:10,MaxNearbyEntitie
s:5,SpawnPotentials:[{Id:"FallingSand",Weight:1,Properties:{Block:redstone_block,Time:1,P
os:[-644,4,-1868]}},{Id:"FallingSand",Weight:1,Properties:{Block:redstone_block,Pos:[-642
,4,-1868],Time:1}},{Id:"FallingSand",Weight:1,Properties:{Block:redstone_block,Pos:[-640,
4,-1868],Time:1}},{Id:"FallingSand",Weight:1,Properties:{Block:redstone_block,Pos:[-638,4
,-1868],Time:1}},{Id:"FallingSand",Weight:1,Properties:{Block:redstone_block,Pos:[-636,4,
-1868],Time:1}}]}复制代码
不行啊，刷怪笼是块沙子，不是红石块，而且刷出的沙子不在指定的坐标上，并且刷出第一个后，又变成小猪刷怪笼了。

replies.author: Deing
replies.txt_content:
我试了一下，如下指令在1.8.9可以一直召唤掉落沙，
setblock ~ ~+2 ~ mob_spawner 0 replace {MaxSpawnDelay:10,MinSpawnDelay:10,SpawnCount:1,Delay:10,RequiredPlayerRange:200,SpawnRange:20,MaxNearbyEntities:5,EntityId:FallingSand,SpawnPotentials:
[{Type:"FallingSand",Weight:1,Properties:{EntityId:FallingSand，Block:redstone_block,DropItem:0,Time:50,Pos:[-644.5,4.0,-1868.5]}},{Type:"FallingSand",Weight:1,Properties:{Block:redstone_block,Pos:[-642.5,4.0,-1868.5],DropItem:0,Time:50,EntityId:FallingSand}},{Type:"FallingSand",Weight:1,Properties:{Block:redstone_block,Pos:[-640.5,4.0,-1868.5],DropItem:0,Time:50,EntityId:FallingSand}},{Type:"FallingSand",Weight:1,Properties:{Block:redstone_block,Pos:[-638.5,4.0,-1868.5],DropItem:0,Time:50,EntityId:FallingSand}},{Type:"FallingSand",Weight:1,Properties:{Block:redstone_block,Pos:[-636.5,4.0,-1868.5],DropItem:0,Time:50,EntityId:FallingSand}}]}复制代码
但是，如下两种指令在1.9都只能召唤一次，之后变成猪并且无法生出猪（我是草地超平坦）
setblock ~ ~+2 ~ mob_spawner 0 replace {MaxSpawnDelay:10,MinS
pawnDelay:10,SpawnCount:1,Delay:10,RequiredPlayerRange:200,SpawnRange:20,MaxNearbyEntitie
s:5,SpawnData:{id:FallingSand,Time:50,Block:redstone_block},SpawnPotentials:
[{Type:"FallingSand",Weight:1,Properties:{EntityId:FallingSand，Block:redstone_block,Time:50,P
os:[-644.5,4.0,-1868.5]}},复制代码setblock ~ ~+2 ~ mob_spawner 0 replace {MaxSpawnDelay:10,MinS
pawnDelay:10,SpawnCount:1,Delay:10,RequiredPlayerRange:200,SpawnRange:20,MaxNearbyEntitie
s:5,SpawnData:{id:FallingSand,Time:50,Block:redstone_block},SpawnPotentials:

[{Type:"FallingSand",Weight:1,Properties:{id:FallingSand，Block:redstone_block,Time:50,P
os:[-644.5,4.0,-1868.5]}},复制代码
所有指令我都是tp到-636.5,4.0,-1868.5附近执行的，并且周围生物数也不足maxnearbyentities规定的数目，但是都无法刷出红石块
所以，要不然1.9在这里有一个bug，要不然就是spawnpotentials格式改变了，但是我在英文wiki上看了半天，没有觉得有什么不同，所以我不能解决你的问题了，很抱歉。
不过现在我也很想知道这到底是怎么回事了所以@FHC红石,@lzs1234 ,@林扬骐 ,不知他们能不能解决

replies.author: Deing
replies.txt_content:
我真是太笨了，一直没找对正确的地方！
今天去看了1.9特性列表才发现是1.9刷怪笼这部分都改了，你的指令写成如下格式就没有问题了，实测OK！
setblock ~ ~2 ~ mob_spawner 0 replace {MaxSpawnDelay:10,MinSpawnDelay:10,SpawnCount:1,Delay:10,RequiredPlayerRange:200,SpawnRange:10,MaxNearbyEntities:5,SpawnData:{id:FallingSand,Block:redstone_block,Time:1},SpawnPotentials:
[{Weight:1,Entity:{id:FallingSand,Block:redstone_block,Time:1,Pos:[-644.5,4.0,-1868.5]}},
{Weight:1,Entity:{id:FallingSand,Block:redstone_block,Time:1,Pos:[-642.5,4.0,-1868.5]}},
{Weight:1,Entity:{id:FallingSand,Block:redstone_block,Time:1,Pos:[-640.5,4.0,-1868.5]}},
{Weight:1,Entity:{id:FallingSand,Block:redstone_block,Time:1,Pos:[-638.5,4.0,-1868.5]}}]}

你也可以去看看1.9特性列表，里边提到了mob_spawner的这个更新，注意到没有type和properties了而是换成了entity

replies.author: 杨了个景
replies.txt_content:
Deing 发表于 2016-3-12 12:03
我真是太笨了，一直没找对正确的地方！
今天去看了1.9特性列表才发现是1.9刷怪笼这部分都改了，你的指令写 ...setblock ~ ~2 ~ mob_spawner 0 replace {MaxSpawnDelay:10,MinSpawnDelay:10,SpawnCount:1,Delay:10,RequiredPlayerRange:200,SpawnRange:10,MaxNearbyEntities:5,SpawnData:{id:FallingSand,Block:redstone_block},SpawnPotentials:[{Weight:1,Entity:{id:FallingSand,Block:redstone_block,Time:1,Pos:[-636,4,-1848]}},{Weight:1,Entity:{id:FallingSand,Block:redstone_block,Time:1,Pos:[-639,4,-1848]}},{Weight:1,Entity:{id:FallingSand,Block:redstone_block,Time:1,Pos:[-642,4,-1848]}},{Weight:1,Entity:{id:FallingSand,Block:redstone_block,Time:1,Pos:[-645,4,-1848]}}]}复制代码
如果坐标是小数（0.5）的话，刷出第一个后不会再刷了，我把它改成了整数后，掉落红石块又到处乱刷。
